settings.content: Important Instagram user feed setup requires an account authorisation to display your images - [click here](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk/customer/portal/articles/1563466-instagram-feed) for instructions

settings.label: Show sidebar
settings.info: Enable sidebar on collection page with side menus

settings.content: To use the Sidebar: In your admin for each collection choose template: collection.sidebar

The following options rely on your use of Product Tags.... You can enter anything in these areas providing that it exists as a product tag. To work effectively the tags must match case and spelling and all must be comma separated
Any empty fields will be hidden
The mailing list popup uses a cookie so that your customers see the popup only once every 3 days.

settings.label: Add popup image
settings.info: Include an image with the email popup

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
